page.title: 15Adult Clubs
page.content: In Penkridge there are many clubs, there is a club for almost every activity you can think of, such as: badminton, tennis, football, cricket, darts, CB, pigeon, swimming, karate, bell ringing, squash, judo, bingo, pool, riffle shooting and keep fit. There are also evening classes for a variety of activities, including lace making. Some of these clubs raise money for charity such as the CB club. They raise money by doing many things. They do knitting of soft toys and the money they raise is paying for a mini bus for the handicapped. They also helped to buy a heart machine for the health centre and a mini bus for the Old People's Home in Penkridge. The CB club hold a meeting every Thursday night at the Penkridge Social Club.
